name: Doodle Police Car Hill Racing Free Game
name_original: Doodle Police Car Hill Racing Free Game
description: Get your hands on some fun doodle police car hill racing action! Tons of levels!!! Super easy touch controls. Very addicting! Touch the screen to accelerate the police car when going downhill. Release when going uphill to launch your car into the sky! Super fun, super fast! Game Center for high scores! Download for FREE today!
